thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 30 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-DIRTT Environmental Solutions Reports Qtrly Net Income Per Share Of $0.04

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-DIRTT Environmental Solutions Reports Qtrly Net Income Per Share Of $0.04
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - DIRTT Environmental Solutions Ltd :
* DIRTT ANNOUNCES STRONG RESULTS IN FIRST QUARTER 2018 * QTRLY REVENUE INCREASED BY 24.1% FROM Q1 2017, TO $80.7 MILLION
* QTRLY NET INCOME PER SHARE WAS $0.04 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.02, REVENUE VIEW C$78.4 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* DIRTT ENVIRONMENTAL SOLUTIONS - WEAKENING U.S. DOLLAR TO CANADIAN DOLLAR AVERAGE EXCHANGE RATES IN Q1 PARTIALLY REDUCED INCREASE IN SG&A, ADJUSTED. SG&A EXPENSES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
